name: Introductory Psychology
description: Overview of the field of psychology, including the history, major theories, and methods of research.

name: Biological Bases of Behavior
description: Overview of the physiological and evolutionary bases of behavior.

name: Developmental Psychology
description: Overview of the physical, cognitive, and social development of humans from conception to old age.

name: Cognitive Development
description: Examination of the development of cognitive processes throughout the life span.

name: Social Development
description: Examination of the development of social processes throughout the life span.
